mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.member_id AS "memberId", b.code AS "memberCode", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.money AS "money", a.d0_money AS "d0Money", a.d0_member_fee AS "d0MemberFee", a.d0_member_draw AS "d0MemberDraw", a.d0_routeway_fee AS "d0RoutewayFee", a.d0_routeway_draw AS "d0RoutewayDraw", a.t1_money AS "t1Money", a.t1_member_fee AS "t1MemberFee", a.t1_member_draw AS "t1MemberDraw", a.t1_routeway_fee AS "t1RoutewayFee", a.t1_routeway_draw AS "t1RoutewayDraw", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.txn_type AS "txnType", a.txn_method AS "txnMethod", a.pt_serial_no AS "ptSerialNo", a.req_date AS "reqDate", a.resp_date AS "respDate", a.resp_type AS "respType", a.resp_code AS "respCode", a.resp_msg AS "respMsg", a.card_type AS "cardType", a.route_id AS "routeId", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.balance_date AS "balanceDate", a.channel_no AS "channelNo", a.settle_type AS "settleType", a.settle_cancel_flag AS "settleCancelFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.code AS "member.code", b.name AS "member.name", b.name AS "memberName", o.name AS "office.name", o.parent_ids AS "office.parentIds", o.agt_grade AS "office.agtGrade",
a.txn_date AS "txDate", right(a.resp_date,6) AS "txTime",
a.member_trade_rate AS "memberTradeRate", a.member_draw_fee AS "memberDrawFee", a.member_settle_money AS "memberSettleMoney", b.mobile_phone AS "mobilePhone", a.interface_type AS "interfaceType",
oi.PARENT_ID_LEVEL_1_NAME as "agentNameLevel1"

`d`.`id` AS `id`, `d`.`txn_date` AS `txn_date`, `d`.`member_id` AS `member_id`, `d`.`member_code` AS `member_code`, `d`.`merchant_code` AS `merchant_code`, `d`.`money` AS `money`, `d`.`member_trade_rate` AS `member_trade_rate`, `d`.`member_draw_fee` AS `member_draw_fee`, `d`.`member_settle_money` AS `member_settle_money`, `d`.`d0_money` AS `d0_money`, `d`.`d0_member_fee` AS `d0_member_fee`, `d`.`d0_member_draw` AS `d0_member_draw`, `d`.`d0_routeway_fee` AS `d0_routeway_fee`, `d`.`d0_routeway_draw` AS `d0_routeway_draw`, `d`.`t1_money` AS `t1_money`, `d`.`t1_member_fee` AS `t1_member_fee`, `d`.`t1_member_draw` AS `t1_member_draw`, `d`.`t1_routeway_fee` AS `t1_routeway_fee`, `d`.`t1_routeway_draw` AS `t1_routeway_draw`, `d`.`order_code` AS `order_code`, `d`.`order_num_outer` AS `order_num_outer`, `d`.`txn_method` AS `txn_method`, `d`.`txn_type` AS `txn_type`, `d`.`pt_serial_no` AS `pt_serial_no`, `d`.`req_date` AS `req_date`, `d`.`resp_date` AS `resp_date`, `d`.`resp_type` AS `resp_type`, `d`.`resp_code` AS `resp_code`, `d`.`resp_msg` AS `resp_msg`, `d`.`card_type` AS `card_type`, `d`.`route_id` AS `route_id`, `d`.`pay_time` AS `pay_time`, `d`.`balance_date` AS `balance_date`, `d`.`channel_no` AS `channel_no`, `d`.`settle_type` AS `settle_type`, `d`.`interface_type` AS `interface_type`, `d`.`platform_type` AS `platform_type`, `d`.`settle_cancel_flag` AS `settle_cancel_flag`, `d`.`create_by` AS `create_by`, `d`.`create_date` AS `create_date`, `d`.`update_by` AS `update_by`, `d`.`update_date` AS `update_date`, `d`.`remarks` AS `remarks`, `d`.`del_flag` AS `del_flag`, '' AS `acc`

`e`.`id` AS `id`, `e`.`txn_date` AS `txn_date`, `e`.`member_id` AS `member_id`, `e`.`member_code` AS `member_code`, `e`.`merchant_code` AS `merchant_code`, `e`.`money` AS `money`, `e`.`member_trade_rate` AS `member_trade_rate`, `e`.`member_draw_fee` AS `member_draw_fee`, `e`.`member_settle_money` AS `member_settle_money`, `e`.`d0_money` AS `d0_money`, `e`.`d0_member_fee` AS `d0_member_fee`, `e`.`d0_member_draw` AS `d0_member_draw`, `e`.`d0_routeway_fee` AS `d0_routeway_fee`, `e`.`d0_routeway_draw` AS `d0_routeway_draw`, `e`.`t1_money` AS `t1_money`, `e`.`t1_member_fee` AS `t1_member_fee`, `e`.`t1_member_draw` AS `t1_member_draw`, `e`.`t1_routeway_fee` AS `t1_routeway_fee`, `e`.`t1_routeway_draw` AS `t1_routeway_draw`, `e`.`order_code` AS `order_code`, `e`.`order_num_outer` AS `order_num_outer`, `e`.`txn_method` AS `txn_method`, `e`.`txn_type` AS `txn_type`, `e`.`pt_serial_no` AS `pt_serial_no`, `e`.`req_date` AS `req_date`, `e`.`resp_date` AS `resp_date`, `e`.`resp_type` AS `resp_type`, `e`.`resp_code` AS `resp_code`, `e`.`resp_msg` AS `resp_msg`, '' AS `card_type`, '' AS `route_id`, `e`.`pay_time` AS `pay_time`, '' AS `balance_date`, '' AS `channel_no`, `e`.`settle_type` AS `settle_type`, '' AS `interface_type`, '' AS `platform_type`, '' AS `settle_cancel_flag`, `e`.`create_by` AS `create_by`, `e`.`create_date` AS `create_date`, `e`.`update_by` AS `update_by`, `e`.`update_date` AS `update_date`, `e`.`remarks` AS `remarks`, `e`.`del_flag` AS `del_flag`, `e`.`acc` AS `acc`

LEFT JOIN bu_member_info b ON b.id = a.member_id LEFT JOIN bu_epay_code c ON c.pay_code = b.pay_code LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = c.office_id left join v_agent_level_info oi on oi.id = c.office_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM v_trade_detail a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bu_trade_detail( id, member_id, member_code, merchant_code, money, order_code, txn_type, pt_serial_no, req_date, resp_date, resp_type, resp_code, resp_msg, card_type, route_id, pay_time, balance_date, channel_no, settle_type, settle_cancel_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{memberCode}, #{merchantCode}, #{money}, #{orderCode}, #{txnType}, #{ptSerialNo}, #{reqDate}, #{respDate}, #{respType}, #{respCode}, #{respMsg}, #{cardType}, #{routeId}, #{payTime}, #{balanceDate}, #{channelNo}, #{settleType}, #{settleCancelFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bu_trade_detail SET member_id = #{memberId}, member_code = #{memberCode}, merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, money = #{money}, order_code = #{orderCode}, txn_type = #{txnType}, pt_serial_no = #{ptSerialNo}, req_date = #{reqDate}, resp_date = #{respDate}, resp_type = #{respType}, resp_code = #{respCode}, resp_msg = #{respMsg}, card_type = #{cardType}, route_id = #{routeId}, pay_time = #{payTime}, balance_date = #{balanceDate}, channel_no = #{channelNo}, settle_type = #{settleType}, settle_cancel_flag = #{settleCancelFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
